Jatropha diseased: Prune and burn infected branches immediately, collect and destroy fallen leaves, spray copper oxychloride 0.25% or mancozeb + carbendazim alternately at 15-day intervals during rainy season for leaf spot/collar rot, drench root zone with trichoderma viride or metalaxyl-mancozeb if root/crown rot suspected, avoid water stagnation.
